title: (x) sans in coarse resolution date - Myriad {Tiff}
content:
Hey guys,

I have a font here I am trying to Identiy. I tried several of the automated system I found on google, and also the ones where you go through a list of 20 some odd questions, but those didnt work very well.

Hopefully the trained eyes of some of the experts on here will have more luck.

I have attached the image below.

Thanks for the help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_forum.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211213923/http:/typophile.com/files/font_forum_0.gif) | 2.51 KB |

 [‹ (x) incotec/incoplan/incosav/incovar logo FF Meta-like sans - ITC Quay Sans {Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211213923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39091 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) serif font used for "BC" logo - University Roman {J. Edward Sanchez} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080211213923/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39109 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nefarious986

comments.content:
Is this from a fax? It’s very low resolution. Maybe Frutiger?

- Lex
It’s Myriad. I don’t know of any Myriad knock-offs – does any such exist?

<cite>any Myriad knock-offs</cite>  
Frutiger Next?

Sorry, just kidding.
Why would you want a Myriad knock-off?
